title: TskDialogActionButton
description: action button typically used at the bottom of a dialog

rows.name: action: (result: ResultT) => void
rows.description: to proform when button is clicked

rows.name: closeOnClick: boolean
rows.description: whether the button should close the dialog (defaults to true)

rows.name: type: 'raised' | 'stroked'
rows.description: of button to use (uses mat-button if no type is specified)

rows.name: value: ResultT
rows.description: to pass to action if specified or to close the dialog if not
